thread.title: Tyler Marquez
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Tyler Marquez

author: Tyler Marquez
title: Tyler Marquez
text:
I shop on this site almost daily and end up spending $10-20 on about 10-20 games. I have yet to play all of the bundles I buy but for the prices it's worth adding to your Steam collection.
Would recommend this site to any hardcore gamer or even a casual gamer who's just looking to buy and play new games at an affordable price!
